metadata.title: CVE-2016-3674 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple XML external entity (XXE) vulnerabilities in the (1) Dom4JDriver,(2) DomDriver, (3) JDomDriver, (4) JDom2Driver, (5) SjsxpDriver, (6)StandardStaxDriver, and (7) WstxDriver drivers in XStream before 1.4.9allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted XML document.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
